title: Alison Hammond's Florida Unpacked
overview: For years Alison worked as a tour rep following in the footsteps of her mother, who was a hard-working, no-nonsense travel agent. Her passion for travel will take audiences of this new series on a journey with her son Aidan. The pair will embark on an adventure-packed exploration of Florida, unveiling the state's hidden gems and providing viewers with practical and budget-friendly travel advice.
